p: Inorganic NPs such as ZnO, SiO 2, TiO 2, and AgNPs were studied for their plant protection potential [ 168]. For example, ZnONPs have been shown to provide effective growth control of fungi such as Alternaria alternate, Aspergillus flavus, Fusarium graminearum, F. oxysporum, Penicillium expansum, and Rhizopus stolonifer as well as of the Pseudomonas aeruginosa bacteria [ 168, 169]. Moreover, TiO 2 systems have been found to protect crops through a direct antimicrobial activity [ 170].
